# Characteristic Units

**API Collection**

Descriptions of the units of a characteristic.

## Overview

Expect to find one of these values in the [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMCharacteristicMetadata/units] property of a characteristic’s metadata.

## Parts Per Total

- **HMCharacteristicMetadataUnitsPercentage**: The unit of the characteristic is a percentage.
- **HMCharacteristicMetadataUnitsPartsPerMillion**: The unit of the characters is parts per million.

## Temperature

- **HMCharacteristicMetadataUnitsCelsius**: The unit of the characteristic is celsius.
- **HMCharacteristicMetadataUnitsFahrenheit**: The unit of the characteristic is fahrenheit.

## Time

- **HMCharacteristicMetadataUnitsSeconds**: The unit of the characteristic is seconds.

## Light

- **HMCharacteristicMetadataUnitsLux**: The unit of the characteristic is lux (that is, illuminance).

## Mass

- **HMCharacteristicMetadataUnitsMicrogramsPerCubicMeter**: The unit of the characteristic is micrograms per cubic meter.

## Rotation

- **HMCharacteristicMetadataUnitsArcDegree**: The unit of the characteristic is the degrees of an arc.

## Specifying units

- **units**: The units of the characteristic value.
